mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BRANCHES ( BRANCH_NAME, BRANCH_ADDRESS, BRANCH_PHONE, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY ) VALUES ( #{branchName}, #{branchAddress}, #{branchPhone}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy} )
mapper.select: SELECT -- 지점 정보 A.BRANCH_ID, A.BRANCH_NAME, A.BRANCH_ADDRESS, A.BRANCH_PHONE, A.CREATED_AT, A.UPDATED_AT, A.CREATED_BY, A.UPDATED_BY, -- 등록한 사람, 수정한 사람 B.USER_NAME AS CREATED_USER_NAME, B.USER_PHONE AS CREATED_USER_PHONE, C.USER_NAME AS UPDATED_USER_NAME, C.USER_PHONE AS UPDATED_USER_PHONE FROM BRANCHES A LEFT JOIN USERS B ON B.USER_ID = A.CREATED_BY LEFT JOIN USERS C ON C.USER_ID = A.UPDATED_BY WHERE BRANCH_ID = #{branchId} LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BRANCHES WHERE BRANCH_ID = #{branchId} LIMIT 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BRANCHES WHERE 1=1
